Xml

type
class
metadata
:keep
:coreApi
The standard Xml class and parsing. More API to manipulate XML are available in the haxe.xml package.

Static Variables

CData(default,null) : XmlType

A type of Xml node.

Comment(default,null) : XmlType

A type of Xml node.

DocType(default,null) : XmlType

A type of Xml node.

Document(default,null) : XmlType

A type of Xml node.

Element(default,null) : XmlType

A type of Xml node.

PCData(default,null) : XmlType

A type of Xml node.

ProcessingInstruction(default,null) : XmlType

A type of Xml node.

Constructor

new()

Instance Variables

nodeType(default,null) : XmlType

Returns the type of the Xml Node. This should be used before accessing other functions since some might raise an exception if the node type is not correct.

Instance Methods

elements() : Iterator<Xml>

Returns an iterator of all child nodes which are Elements. Only works if the current node is an Element or a Document.

get(att : String) : String

Get the given attribute of an Element node. Returns null if not found. Attributes are case-sensitive.
